descriptor.name: Soulflower Rosemary Lavender Oil for Healthy Hair Scalp
descriptor.long_desc: Soulflower Rosemary Lavender Hair Oil for Healthy Hair, Scalp, Hair Roots - 100% Pure  Natural Undiluted Coldpressed Oil, 225ml Dampen your hair with water to make the oil application on the scalp easy. Take 2-3 ml of Soulflower hair oil and apply gently on the scalp. Leave it overnight. Use 3 times a week for optimal results. Hair Growth, Anti Hair Loss, Volumizing, Nourishing, Moisturizing

descriptor.name: Parachute Advance Gold Hair Oil
descriptor.long_desc: Parachute Advansed Gold Coconut Hair Oil Is Made With The Finest Handpicked Coconuts. With The Goodness Of Pure Coconut Oil And Vitamin E, It Nourishes Your Hair From Within To Make Them Long, Strong And Gorgeous. Increased blood circulation relaxes your scalp and leads to increased hair growth. Hair is a strand of protein that becomes brittle with increased exposure to pollution and abrasive hair products. A very reliable and authentic product.

descriptor.name: Fiama Bathing Bar Fresh Gel
descriptor.long_desc: Wash away the troubles of your day, with the foamy, fresh, and fun Fiama Gel Bars. And while you enjoy your Fiama bath, let its skin-conditioners work their magic to give you soft, moisturised and glowing skin. Try the Fiama Fresh Celebration pack with 3 new  unique gel bars each with unique ingredients and natural goodness that will refresh your mind and body. So uplift your mood and get ready to make every bath, a highlight of your day.

descriptor.name: Ariana Grande Frankie Edp 100ml For Women
descriptor.long_desc: Ariana Grande Frankie 100ml Eau de Parfum captures the essence of youthful sophistication and unabashed glamour, embodying the star power and charisma of its namesake. This fragrance is a vibrant celebration of individuality and self-expression, designed for those who embrace their unique style and exude confidence effortlessly.A best heven smell for every life.

descriptor.name: Acqua Di Gio Parfum By Giorgio Armani Perfume for Men 2023 Release
descriptor.long_desc: This is Aromatic andFresh with SpicyMarineCitrus. Gives you a better peace. Should try once in your life.Acqua di giò parfum is distinguished by its incense notes, which bring an incandescent intensity to the emblematic marine notes of Acqua di Giò. The result is a charismatic, vibrant fragrance with an aura of mystery, that is representative of a rugged landscape meeting the ocean’s strength and immensity. A new preciousness is evoked in the bottle’s design, with the flacon’s sleek, masculine form crafted in tones of graduated black.Good brand for every occasion.

descriptor.name: Thank U Next 2.0 Ariana Grande Edp 100ml For Women
descriptor.long_desc: Fragrance TypeFruitySweetWoody. This is a good perfume for any occasion. Make you feel like in heven .Thank U, Next by Ariana Grande is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. Thank U, Next was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Jérôme Epinette.Optimistically outspoken. Playful yet cool. Thank U Next Eau de Parfum by Ariana Grande. The ultimate fragrance for moving on and looking up.This sweet perfume boasts plenty of fruity, floral and gourmand accords for a lush, dazzling result that's sure to get you noticed from across a room.

descriptor.name: Gentleman Givenchy Reserve Privee EDP 100ml For Men
descriptor.long_desc: The Gentleman Réserve Privée eau de parfum from Givenchy is inspired by smooth, flavourful whisky. Delicate floral notes meet woody depths, as bergamot essence and vetiver further intensify this elegant fragrance. Expect an olfactory experience filled with savoir-faire and timeless appeal.Combination of woody and spicy fragrance. Good for men for any party or any special occasion.
